author: Steve Friess
title: Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer Talks Trump, VP Rumors and Tough New Stay-At-Home Rules
description: "That woman from Michigan," as Donald Trump has referred to Michigan Governor, talks frankly about the problems in her state due to COVID-19, the sexism she's faced and whether she really believes the president didn't know her name.
content: The 49th governor of Michigan swings from one phone call to another for hours on end these days as she tries, from a safe social distance, to guide her state through a catastrophe that was beyond most Americans' wildest imagination until just a few weeks ago.… [+5957 chars]
